policy.title: How can lifelong learning, including continuous training within the labour market, be enabled and who will pay for this? Looking forward to 2025 and 2040 how might this evolve?

source.description: GOV.UK is a central website that covers all UK government departments, as well as many other agencies and public bodies. All policy papers and research publications by the UK government are listed on GOV.UK.
